name: 400th Anniversary of the Battle of Murten
obverse: An armored soldier raising his sword in his right hand and holding a battle flag in his left hand. To the left of the soldier is a battle camp and army, the sun shining above. To the right of the soldier is another army.
obverse_inscriptions: AUF EIDGENOSSEN GOTT LEUCHTET UNS ZUM SIEGE!
reverse: An obelisk surrounded by 14 coat of arms. Below the obelisk are two shields and branches.
reverse_inscriptions: Z. ERINNERUNG AD SIEG D. EIDGENOSSEN ÜBER KARL D. KÜHNEN
description: This medal was made to commemorate the 400th Anniversary of the Battle of Murten.
